description.english: Obtained if the player completes 5 laps without getting any damage to the car. Any mode.
Obtained if the player completes 10 valid laps in Hotlap mode.
Obtained if the player completes 10 valid laps in Practice mode
Obtained if the player completes 3 laps in Time Attack Mode
Obtained if the player completes 5 laps in Time Attack Mode.
Obtained if the player completes 10 laps in Time Attack Mode.
Obtained if the player reaches the max level of damage on his car.
Obtained if the player completes 10 laps in practice mode with no assists. If the car has some assist by default, the player must turn them off.
Obtained if the player drive more than 100 Km in one session
Obtained if the player drive more than 250 Km in one session
Obtained if the player achieves 10 combos in drift mode
Obtained if the player achieves 25 combos in drift mode
Obtained if the player achieves 50 combos in drift mode
Obtained if the player drive more than 50 Km in one session
